pages.text: The $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() is the only way to transmit $(thing)Hot Air$() horizontally. It can either be placed on top or below a block, and when linked with another $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() in the opposite position they will transmit $(thing)Hot Air$() between eachother.$(br2)$(item)Wormhole Funnels$() can be linked together by using a $(item)Wormhole Linker$().

Right click a $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() then the other to link them.$(br)Once linked you can right click any of the two $(item)Wormhole Funnels$() with anything that's not a block or the $(item)Wormhole Linker$() to show you where the other $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() is.$(br2)A $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() can only be linked to another $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() in the same dimension and less than 8 blocks away on all axis. It also can only be linked to one other $(item)Wormhole Funnel$() at a time.
